NAME: CA. Atish Rathod
ABOUT:
-Chartered Accountant having cleared all levels of CA examination conducted by The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India [ICAI] in First Attempt. Member of the ICAI since May 2010.

-Have also cleared all levels of CS examination conducted by The Institute of Company Secretaries of India [ICSI] in First Attempt.

-Graduation from Nagindas Khandwala College, Mumbai.

-Currently working with Indigo Jewellery Private Limited as Head-Accounts & Finance. 

-Past experience includes working with M.V.Damania & Co. in the Audit department. Also, I have done my articleship from Kedia Mukesh & Co.
